mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pcomment(cno, product_code, content, wname) VALUES(pcomment_seq.nextval, #{product_code}, #{content}, #{wname})
mapper.select: SELECT cno, product_code, content, wname, regdate FROM pcomment WHERE product_code=#{product_code} ORDER BY regdate
mapper.update: UPDATE pcomment set content = #{content} WHERE cno = #{cno}
